fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Distract someone with an obsidian knife.
- Hit them with a baseball bat in your other hand.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Distracting someone with an obsidian knife roleblocks them.
- Hitting them with a baseball bat in your other hand kills them.
- Can use multiple abilities, but may only use each ability once per night.
